        <general>
          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en-US">Have You Seen Any Patterns Lately</string>
          </title>
          <language>en-US</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en-US">This flipchart is an introduction to patterns. It includes simple patterns made with sticks, shapes, and colors. There are pages set up with patterns started and pages where students can create their own patterns. It works great as a center.</string>
